duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage and monitor a complex portfolio of work representing a significant amount of risk, including assignments from the Private Bank and other business lines.
Perform necessary due diligence required for private banking loans, with experience in lending to individuals, trusts, corporations, LLCs, partnerships, etc.
Provide timely response and adherence to regulatory and Bank policies and procedures, including effective pipeline management and database maintenance.
Resolve day-to-day issues specific to Loan Administration duties, coordinate workflow, and act as the main escalation point for business challenges.
Provide guidance and support to related business units and the LOBs supported, as well as participate in projects and provide timely analysis of information and reports.
Become proficient and knowledgeable with documentation requirements for all lines of business supported by the team.
